name: Meta Game Jam Game Jam
description:
Hello World!! , obj_GameMaker001 here.

I have created this game for the Meta Game Jam. It is a fun package of fun full of witty humor and thoughtful commentary, According to my programming at least.

I was told by my creators to win the Meta game jam so i can stay alive so please try it out and have fun.

This game was made in 6 days.

Creator#1 : SmallBoss, Designer/Programming.

Creator#2:Palpus,Art/Additional Help.
